content: lion brand pattern # 60254 skill level intermediate level 3 homespun® article #790 a 3 balls b 3 balls c 2 balls plus d 990-170 glitterspun yarn gold 345 yards total *glitterspun has been discontinued worsted/aran weight yarn may be substituted * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm crochet hook - size i-9 for star motifs with smaller hook and d make 24 stars place wrong sides of 2 stars together and sew edges together repeat for all pairs of stars to yield 12 stars after afghan body has been completed 3 stars are attached to each of the 4 corners to complete the project with larger hook work afghan body in half_double_crochet u s following color chart use separate balls of yarn for each section of color the edging is crocheted with one strand each of c and d held together
